data.title: Cafes and Restaurants @Marina Bay MRT
data.meta_description: Need a restaurant/cafe near Marina Bay MRT Station? Find one fast here!
data.text:
Cafes and Restaurants Directory

— Marina Bay MRT —

Wafuken @Asia Square

For Fully Customisable Meals! Featuring Sous Vide meats and healthy sides. Real food that looks and tastes good.

Location 12 Marina View, Asia Square Tower 2 #02-05, S018961

MRT Stations (within 800 metres) Downtown, Telok Ayer, Marina Bay, Tanjong Pagar, Raffles Place

Opening Hours Mon to Fri: 11am to 8pm

PH/Weekends: Closed

Value Added Service(s)

Payment Terms Nett Prices (Cash/Nets/Credit Card)

Kimoto Gastro Bar @The Sail At Marina Bay

Visit Kimoto Gastro Bar for affordable and delicious Japanese kushiyaki/tempura rice bowl sets during lunch! This place is also popular for unwinding after work with draft beers, whiskey and sake.

Location 6 Marina Boulevard, The Sail #01-15, S018985

MRT Stations (within 800 metres) Downtown, Raffles Place, Telok Ayer, Marina Bay, Bayfront

Opening Hours Mon to Fri: 11.30am to 2.30pm (last order 2pm), 5pm to 9pm (last order 8.30pm)

Value Added Service(s) Free WiFi, Home Delivery (via Grab or call +65 6222 7588)

Payment Terms Prices Subjected to Service Charge and GST (Cash/Nets/Credit Card)

Three Hands Coffee @The Sail At Marina Bay

Cafe By Day, Bar By Night. For Small Bites, Cakes, Coffee, Wines and Bottled Beers. Coffee Is Served Until 5pm Only.

Location 2 Marina Boulevard, The Sail@Marina Bay #01-01, S018987

MRT Stations (within 800 metres) Downtown, Raffles Place, Telok Ayer, Marina Bay, Bayfront

Opening Hours Mon to Fri: 8.30am to 9pm (Coffee is served until 5pm)

Sat/Sun/PH: Closed

Value Added Service(s) Free WiFi, Charging Points, PokeStop (White Disc on Grass)

Payment Terms Nett Prices for Cafe, Prices Subjected to Service Charge for Bar (Cash/Nets/Credit Card-Min. S$30 Spent)

Promotion

Coffee promotion: Black S$3 Nett, White S$4 Nett, Upsize S$5 Nett. Valid 8am to 11am, Mon to Fri.

1 for 1 bottled beer from S$7.99+ onwards. Valid 5pm to 8pm, Mon to Fri.

Patisserie G @Downtown Gallery

For Gourmet Sandwiches, Beautiful Dome Cakes and Drinks.

Location 6A Shenton Way, Downtown Gallery #01-30/34, S068815

MRT Stations (within 800 metres) Tanjong Pagar, Telok Ayer, Downtown, Marina Bay

Opening Hours Mon to Fri: 7.30am to 7pm

Sat: 9am to 4pm

Sun/PH: Closed

Value Added Service(s)

Payment Terms Nett Prices (Cash/Nets/Credit Card)

Wafuken @Downtown Gallery

For Fully Customisable Meals! Featuring Sous Vide meats and healthy sides. Real food that looks and tastes good.

Location 6A Shenton Way, OUE Downtown Gallery #02-23, S068815

MRT Stations (within 800 metres) Tanjong Pagar, Telok Ayer, Downtown, Marina Bay

Opening Hours Mon to Fri: 11am to 8pm

Sat: 11am to 3pm

Sun/PH: Closed

Value Added Service(s)

Payment Terms Nett Prices (Cash/Nets/Credit Card)

Mellower Coffee @Robinson Road

For Shanghai Coffee, Sandwiches and Cakes.

Location 77 Robinson Road #01-03, S068896

MRT Stations (within 800 metres) Tanjong Pagar, Telok Ayer, Downtown, Marina Bay

Opening Hours Mon to Fri: 8am to 7.30pm

Sat: 9am to 4.30pm

Sun: Closed

PH: Please call to check

Value Added Service(s) Free WiFi, Charging Points, Free Iced Water, In-house Toilet, PokeStop (Building People Structure)

Payment Terms Subjected to GST (Cash/Nets/Credit Card)

Promotion

[1] Free Daily Brew Coffee with any cake purchased. Valid Weekdays, 3pm onwards.

[2] 50% off espresso based drinks with any cake purchased. Valid Weekdays, 3pm onwards.

The Providore @Downtown Gallery

The Providore @OUE Downtown Gallery is their flagship outlet in Singapore. The gorgeous and spacious space is made up of a huge cafe, deli, bakery and lifestyle store, allowing one to get lost in good food, grocery shopping and delightful conversations. Apart from the full Providore menu, you can also find a wide range of instaworthy cakes and the largest selection (outside of their warehouse at Tan Boon Liat) of Providore's retail items here.

Location 6A Shenton Way, OUE Downtown Gallery #B1-07, S068815

MRT Stations (within 800 metres) Tanjong Pagar, Telok Ayer, Downtown, Marina Bay

Opening Hours Mon to Fri: 8am to 10.30pm

Sat/Sun/PH: 9am to 6pm

Value Added Service(s) Free WiFi, Kids Friendly (Kids Menu Available/Baby Chair), Retail Products, Wine Room, Cooking Studio, Grocery, Deli, Cheese Room

Payment Terms Prices Subjected to Service Charge and GST (Cash/Nets/Credit Card/Apple Pay)
